ygData.subject: Some more questions
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh yea, a few more questions I came up with this weekend: Should I be developing more than 1HS weapon skill?  (in terms of weapons?) Has anyone tried to make a
ygData.messageBody:
Oh yea, a few more questions I came up with this weekend:

Should I be developing more than 1HS weapon skill? (in terms of
weapons?)
Has anyone tried to make a group of 6 bards doing that AOE song and just
walk around in a dungeon? I'm just curious how effective that group
would be?
What do you guys do with all your practices (hmm maybe I should see
question 1)? It seems most of our skills going up pretty well on their
own with alittle priming...
I was using the Discord song to just kite fire beetles for real nice xp
at lvl 3, is this considered an abuse? (I actualyl try to never take
advantage of games "flaws")

Finally, thanks to all the bards who helped me this weekend! You guys
(and gals) are the best!
--
We now return to the non-stop rock.

Matt DeBarger
